net.mmarss.grease.geom2d

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.mmarss.grease.geom2d.Circle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Circlec

    public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Circlec
    Represents a two-dimensional circle. This class is mutable. If an immutable view of it is desired, it can be up-casted to an instance of the Circlec interface.
